routes.description: Explore the website's content, this page has links to all the routes available in this application.
Detokenize text using the cohere API. This endpoint takes tokens using byte-pair encoding and returns their text representation.
Generate text using the cohere generate API. This endpoint generates realistic text conditioned on a given input.
Detect the language of text using cohere detect API. This endpoint identifies which language each of the provided texts is written in.
Rerank a list of documents using the cohere rerank API. This endpoint takes in a query and a list of texts and produces an ordered array with each text assigned a relevance score.
Generate code using the cohere generate API. Using generate end point to generate code.
Tokenize text using the cohere tokenize API. This endpoint splits input text into smaller units called tokens using byte-pair encoding (BPE).
Summarize text using the cohere summarize API. This endpoint generates a summary in English for a given text.
This endpoint returns text embeddings. An embedding is a list of floating point numbers that captures semantic information about the text that it represents.
This endpoint makes a prediction about which label fits the specified text inputs best.
